00015 // statics
00016 template<class CharT, class Traits, class Alloc> 
00017 typename BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::ref_type
00018 BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::create
00019 (typename BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::str_type const &str) {
00020   if( str.empty() )
00021     return ref_type();
00022   else 
00023     return ref_type(str);
00024 }
00025 
00026 template<class CharT, class Traits, class Alloc> 
00027 typename BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::ref_type
00028 BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::create(CharT const *str, size_t len) {
00029   if( NULL==str || 0==len )
00030     return ref_type();
00031   else if( str_type::npos==len )
00032     return create(str_type(str));
00033   else
00034     return create(str_type(str, len));
00035 }
00036 
00037 // observers
00038 
00039 template<class CharT, class Traits, class Alloc> 
00040 bool BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::operator< 
00041 (BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc> const &other) const {
00042   return !other.empty() &&
00043     ( empty() ||( m_name!=other.m_name &&
00044                 m_name.get()<other.m_name.get() ) );
00045 }
00046 
00047 template<class CharT, class Traits, class Alloc> 
00048 size_t BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::hash() const {
00049   boost::hash<str_type> href;
00050   return href(m_name.get());
00051 }
00052 
00053 template<class CharT, class Traits, class Alloc> 
00054 std::ostream &
00055 BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::print_to(std::ostream &out) const {
00056   if( !empty() )
00057     out<<str();
00058   return out;
00059 }
00060 
00061 template<class CharT, class Traits, class Alloc> 
00062 std::istream &BasicSymbol<CharT, Traits, Alloc>::read_from(std::istream &in) {
00063   str_type tmp;
00064   in>>tmp;
00065   if( in.good() )
00066     m_name = create(tmp);
00067   return in;
00068 }
